mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myblogboard(id, title, content, count, userid, createdate) VALUES (myblogboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{userid}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM myblogboard ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.count, b.userid, b.createdate, u.username FROM myblogboard b JOIN mybloguser u ON(b.userid = u.id) WHERE b.id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM myblogboard ORDER BY id DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN START_ROW(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page}) AND END_ROW(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page})
mapper.update: UPDATE myblogboard set count=count+1 WHERE id=#{id}
